1.title: It's Complicated
1.plot: Meet On Mekahel, model and entrepreneur, as he starts the M.O. Underwear brand with ex-boyfriend Mateusz, days after their breakup. Trouble strikes as On plans a business trip to the factory in LA on Mateusz' birthday weekend.

2.title: Stitches
2.plot: On and Mateusz' trip to the factory in LA proves stressful in the wake of last-minute alterations and repairs to the samples as the day of the photoshoot draws near.

3.title: Full Disclosure
3.plot: Trouble strikes for On during a visit to the PR firm.

4.title: Sources
4.plot: After an intense trip in LA, On travels to his home country of Israel to promote the brand. Things sour after On hears talk of Mateusz' plans for the future.

5.title: Preparation
5.plot: On's having a hard time with his producers and last minute changes on the eve of the big photoshoot.

6.title: Close-Up
6.plot: In the season finale of Putting On, M.O. Underwear faces the big photoshoot.

locations: Michele Marie Public Relations, 8383 Wilshire Blv #220, Beverly Hills, California, USA::(2018) (as Michele Marie PR)
Indie Source, 1933 S Broadway #1168, Los Angeles, CA 90007, USA::(2018)
Kahve, 667 10th Ave, New York, NY 10036, USA::(2018) (as Kahva Coffee NYC)
Chamberlain West Hpollywood Hotel - 1000 Westmount Dr, West Hollywood, California, USA::(2018) (as Chamberlain Hotel West Hpollywood)
imdb.plot outline: PUTTING ON combines the fashion ingenuity of Project Runway, the glamour of America's Next Top Model, and the romantic exploits of Sex and The City. It's fashion, drama, and beautiful young people, seen through the ups and downs of a millennial C.E.O. as he builds an underwear empire within the bustle of the unforgiving Big Apple. The city can make or break you, but lucky for On, he's flexible. Follow On Mekahal's journey from former underwear model to creator of an A-list level fashion brand. This Revry Original Series highlights the real-life relationships and struggles of staying afloat as a model and designer. More importantly, it explores learning how to maintain your status once you finally make a splash in the cut-throat fashion industry. Season One follows On's journey of building his brand with his ex, dealing with manufacturing errors while navigating conflicting deadlines, a final product photo shoot, broken promises and the struggle of managing personal relations.
